definition: to add the finishing touch (abbr. for 畫龍點睛|画龙点睛[hua4 long2 dian3 jing1])

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point

sentences.english: Simile makes the finishing point in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 在英漢語言中，明喻都起到了畫龍點睛的作用。

sentences.english: These sassy shoes will enliven little black dresses.
sentences.chinese: 這些活力四射的鞋子會給小黑裙帶來點睛之效。

sentences.english: The last sentence of this essay makes the finishing point.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章的最後一句話具有畫龍點睛的作用。

sentences.english: A small button, may play a finishing touch on the role of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 一顆小小的鈕釦，可能對服裝起到畫龍點睛的作用。

sentences.english: Italian designer accessories products will benefit your life in the CBD.
sentences.chinese: 名家設計的意利配件類產品會是您生活的點睛之筆。

sentences.english: If combined with pierced processes but also put the finishing touch, complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 如果結合鏤空工藝更是畫龍點睛，相得益彰。

sentences.english: This scarf makes the finishing point of the clothes she wears today.
sentences.chinese: 這條絲巾爲她今天的服裝起到了畫龍點睛的作用。

sentences.english: The plaque is the title section of the finishing touch pen.
sentences.chinese: 牌匾的題款乃是畫龍點睛之筆。

sentences.english: Polished river stones make for a nice finishing touch in your Chinese rock garden.
sentences.chinese: 拋光石頭河爲一個不錯的點睛之筆在中國岩石園。

sentences.english: I think that got a lot of press for the game.
sentences.chinese: 我想這是遊戲的畫龍點睛之處。

sentences.english: The Van Cleef &Arpels necklace is a spectacular complement.
sentences.chinese: 梵克雅寶的項鍊就是點睛之筆。

sentences.english: The inside left is passing the oppose side's fullback line.
sentences.chinese: 這左輔畫龍點睛越過對方的後衛線。

definition: to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to arrange/to spread out/to narrate in detail/to describe at great length/to elaborate
to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
